item.text: Then the Lord spoke to Moses in the rift valley plains of Moab along the Jordan near Jericho. He said:

“<st data-num="06680" class="">Instruct</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> to <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in from the <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st> the Israelites<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="0272" class="">possess</st>. You must also <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing land</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st>.

Thus they will <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> in which to <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st>, and their <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing lands</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> for their <st data-num="0929" class="">cattle</st>, for their <st data-num="07399" class="">possessions</st>, and for <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="02416" class="">animals</st>.
The grazing lands around the towns that you will give to the Levites must extend to a distance of 500 yards from the town wall.

“You must measure from outside the wall of the town on the east 1,000 yards, and on the south side 1,000 yards, and on the west side 1,000 yards, and on the north side 1,000 yards, with the town in the middle. This territory must belong to them as grazing land for the towns.
Now from these towns that you will give to the Levites you must select six towns of refuge to which a person who has killed someone may flee. And you must give them 42 other towns.
“So the total of the towns you will give the Levites is 48. You must give these together with their grazing lands.

The towns you will give must be from the possession of the Israelites. From the larger tribes you must give more; and from the smaller tribes fewer. Each must contribute some of its own towns to the Levites in proportion to the inheritance allocated to each.”
Then the Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="01696" class="">Speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> and <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st> them, ‘<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="05674">cross over</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River<n id="1" /> into the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st>,

you must then <st data-num="07136" class="">designate</st> some <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> as <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> for you, <st data-num="08033" class="">to which</st> a person who has <st data-num="07523 05221">killed</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="07684" class="">unintentionally</st> may <st data-num="05127" class="">flee</st>.

And they must <st data-num="01961" class="">stand</st> as your <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> from the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> in order that the <st data-num="07523" class="">killer</st> may <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> he has <st data-num="05975" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">trial</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="05712" class="">community</st>.
These towns that you must give shall be your six towns for refuge.
“‘You must give three towns on this side of the Jordan, and you must give three towns in the land of Canaan; they must be towns of refuge.
These six towns will be places of refuge for the Israelites, and for the resident foreigner, and for the settler among them, so that anyone who kills any person accidentally may flee there.
“‘But if he hits someone with an iron tool so that he dies, he is a murderer. The murderer must surely be put to death.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="05221" class="">strikes</st> him by <st data-num="03027" class="">throwing</st> a <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st> large enough <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> he could <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>, and he <st data-num="04191" class="">dies</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is a <st data-num="07523" class="">murderer</st>. The <st data-num="07523" class="">murderer</st> must <st data-num="04191" class="">surely</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st>.

<st data-num="0176" class="">Or if</st> he <st data-num="05221" class="">strikes</st> him with a <st data-num="06086" class="">wooden</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">weapon</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">so that</st> he could <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>, and he <st data-num="04191" class="">dies</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is a <st data-num="07523" class="">murderer</st>. The <st data-num="07523" class="">murderer</st> must <st data-num="04191" class="">surely</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st>.
The avenger of blood himself must kill the murderer; when he meets him, he must kill him.
“‘But if he strikes him out of hatred or throws something at him intentionally so that he dies,
or with enmity he strikes him with his hand and he dies, the one who struck him must surely be put to death, for he is a murderer. The avenger of blood must kill the murderer when he meets him.
“‘But if he strikes him suddenly, without enmity, or throws anything at him unintentionally,

<st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> with <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st> large enough <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> a man could <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">seeing</st> him, and <st data-num="05307" class="">throws</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> him, and he <st data-num="04191" class="">dies</st>, even though <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> his <st data-num="0341" class="">enemy</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="01245" class="">sought</st> his <st data-num="07451" class="">harm</st>,

then the <st data-num="05712" class="">community</st> must <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="05221" class="">slayer</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> of <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="05921">according to</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">decisions</st>.

The <st data-num="05712" class="">community</st> must <st data-num="05337" class="">deliver</st> the <st data-num="07523" class="">slayer</st> out of the <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> of the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> of <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>, and the <st data-num="05712" class="">community</st> must <st data-num="07725" class="">restore</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">to which</st> he <st data-num="05127" class="">fled</st>, and he must <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> there<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st> of the <st data-num="01419" class="">high</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="04886" class="">anointed</st> with the <st data-num="06944" class="">consecrated</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="07523" class="">slayer</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">at any time</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">goes outside</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">boundary</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">to which</st> he had <st data-num="05127" class="">fled</st>,

and the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> of <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">finds</st> him <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">borders</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st>, and the <st data-num="01350" class="">avenger</st> of <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="07523" class="">kills</st> the <st data-num="07523" class="">slayer</st>, he will <st data-num="0369" class="">not be</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">guilty of blood</st>,

<st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the slayer<n id="1" /> should have <st data-num="03427" class="">stayed</st> in his <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st> of the <st data-num="01419" class="">high</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>. But <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st> of the <st data-num="01419" class="">high</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, the <st data-num="07523" class="">slayer</st> may <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of his <st data-num="0272" class="">possessions</st>.
So these things must be a statutory ordinance for you throughout your generations, in all the places where you live.
“‘Whoever kills any person, the murderer must be put to death by the testimony of witnesses, but one witness cannot testify against any person to cause him to be put to death.

Moreover, you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">accept</st> a <st data-num="03724" class="">ransom</st> for the <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> of a <st data-num="07523" class="">murderer</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="07563" class="">guilty</st> of <st data-num="04191" class="">death</st>; he <st data-num="04191" class="">must</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">surely</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st>.
And you must not accept a ransom for anyone who has fled to a town of refuge, to allow him to return home and live on his own land before the death of the high priest.
“‘You must not pollute the land where you live, for blood defiles the land, and the land cannot be cleansed of the blood that is shed there, except by the blood of the person who shed it.
Therefore do not defile the land that you will inhabit, in which I live, for I the Lord live among the Israelites.’”
